content: KCM-WF Kwik Cast cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance multi-thread, cast-in-place threaded inserts for concrete on wood formwork with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Application-relevant multi-thread configurations Nails above head prevent head pop-offs due to rebar hits Design profile reduces lost anchoring points due to accidental rebar hits Perforated foam protects inner threads from concrete intrusion KCM-WF-ST standing setting tool available to help increase productivity Applications Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements Pre-installed fastening points for seismic bracing applications For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Approvals / Test reports: FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked) Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Technical Data | Approvals / Test reports | FM (Factory Mutual), ICC-ES report (concrete), LABC, Seismic, UL (Underwriter Laboratories) | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (lightweight), Concrete (uncracked) | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Seismic loading | Yes | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Material composition | Zinc-plated, Carbon steel | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2363080 -
